WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing for failure to meet the posting guidelines within 72 hours
WorkItem.Description: when i close rawr 2.3.4 i get an error message that has 3 buttons "details" "continue" and "close" the message reads "close will shut down rawr" so i hit close and nothing happens. i go to exit rawr again and same error. then on the third try it closes but encounters an error. it says to copy it and send it in an email but i cant select any of the text or "ctrl - c" which it says to do. iv encountered no problems yet as to the actual running of rawr, but this is something very odd. i run windows 7 if that matters here since it mattered for some other programs i have as well.

Comments.Message: There should be more information than that on the screen about what the error actually is.
